issue.title: [Flight] Test for cross-version Flight compatibility
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5114](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5114). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As Flight stabilizes, we should make sure that clients and servers in different versions can still communicate.

comments.body:
